About Joview

Nowadays, many people leave their jobs. But why? Maybe it's because the work environment is uncomfortable, or their colleagues are difficult to work with. That's where Joview comes in to solve this issue.

Target:

Joview's main goal is to help people choose the job that suits them best, preventing future problems.

Target Audience:

  • Students and recent graduates
  • Career shifts
  • Employers
  • Universities
